```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
# read in the data
damages <- read_csv(here("data", "damages.csv"))

warming <- read_csv(here("data", "warming.csv"))
```

```{r}
# graphing damages vs. warming
ggplot(data = damages, aes(x = warming,
                           y = damages)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal()+
  labs(x = "Warming (Degrees Celsius)",
       y = "Damages (Dollars)") +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm",
              formula = y ~ I(x^2),
              color = "black",
              size = 0.5,
              fill = "gray10",
              alpha = 0.5) +
  ggpubr::stat_regline_equation(label.x = 4, label.y = 100000000000000)
```
